info.author: Thomas Volk
info.description:
SciBook is a framework for xslt transformation.  The transformation can be extended by adding plugins. 
There are plugins for LaTeX, dia, abc and xfig.  The software comes with a xhtml to html stylesheet to 
generate static html pages from xml template files.
info.keywords: xslt xml transformation xhtml html LaTeX dia xfig abc
info.name: scibook
info.summary: SciBook -- extensible xsl transformer with LaTeX includes
info.html_description: SciBook is a framework for xslt transformation. The transformation can be extended by adding plugins. There are plugins for LaTeX, dia, abc and xfig. The software comes with a xhtml to html stylesheet to generate static html pages from xml template files.
